name: ClusterRegistryProxy
description: Contract to reward overlapping stakes. Contract may or may not change in future (depending upon the new slots in proxy-store). Use this contract only for testing.

functionDecorators.name: updateLogic
functionDecorators.description: Only admin can update the contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _newLogic
parameterDecorators.description: address is the address of the contract that has to updated to.
